div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1819 Susa?, before 1909 (1021) Burial: after 28 B.C. Contents: 50+ AR Attambelus I, Characene: tetradr. (latest 284 S.E. = 29/8 B.C.) Disposition: London 27 Hill, NNM 14 (1922) The coins were bought at Amara, on the Tigris, c. 180 km. above Basra
